data.eml:eml: Review of Stantonia Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Orgilinae) from Vietnam, China, Japan, and Russia, with descriptions of six new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Achterberg, Cornelis van, Long, Khuat Dang, Chen, Xue-xin (2017): Review of Stantonia Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Orgilinae) from Vietnam, China, Japan, and Russia, with descriptions of six new species. ZooKeys 723: 61-119, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.723.21668, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.723.21668
